content.rendered:
2018 NBA All-Star Standard Travel Package Rates

The rates below are based on a standard package including three nights hotel stay, entry level tickets for the NBA All-Star Game, plus much more. You can further customize your package with tickets to additional events, ticket upgrades, extra nights, day tours, room upgrades and other add-ons.

Hotel PackageUpper Level End/CornerUpper Level Side200 Level EndLower Level Side/Corner
O Hotel Los Angeles - Deluxe Room$3,585$5,225$7,375$10,045
O Hotel Los Angeles - City View Room$3,705$5,345$7,495$10,165
Sheraton Grand Los Angeles$5,175$6,815$8,965$11,635
Optional Add-Ons 
NBA All-Star Friday Night Rising Stars Challenge
NBA All-Star Saturday Practice
Flat Rate Roundtrip Airfare$795/person (qualifying flights from 89 major cities in the USA and Canada)
Contact our sports travel specialists for your custom trip quote.
*Rates are per person in USD based on double occupancy. Single occupancy rates are available. Triple and Quad occupancy may be available. A 25% deposit will hold your spot. The balance will not be due until two months prior to departure. Availability and pricing subject to change prior to booking.
